name: Compose.ai
headline: Cut your writing time by 40% with AI-powered autocomplete
description: Compose AI is a free Chrome extension that helps automate your writing using AI. You know how Gmail autocompletes your emails? Compose.ai is like that but everywhere, like how Grammarly works.

founders.name: Michael Shuffett, Founder
founders.description:
Moved to SF to run Quant Collective
Made [Minority Report](https://www.nytimes.com/2011/10/11/science/11predict.html) for US Gov 
Was on highest impact team at Amazon ($6B rev lift in one summer)
Was an Imagineer
Expert consultant to BCG

I can help with data, AI, KPIs, data driven culture, engineering, creating value with applied math

Fun facts:
I have 7 college degrees
2nd degree black belt
I was also banned from talking about the simulation argument in my apartment hot tub

founders.name: Wilson Mitchell, Founder
founders.description: Ex-Amazon, Ex-Coursebase, Living in Japan the last 4+ years and running a Meetup there, Transitioning to a more nomadic lifestyle

# AI-Powered Writing Tool
Generate any text using AI. Autocomplete your sentences where you type. With Compose AI, you can write emails, create documents, and chat faster.
Sign Up It's freeInstall Extension
Backed by 
![YCombinator logo](https://compose.ai/ycombinator.png)
Try it now
Trusted by 10,000+ teams and 400,000 people
![Companies](https://compose.ai/companies.png)
## Write Faster With AI, Save Time
Compose AI is your personal AI writing assistant that cuts your writing time by 40%
![multimedia publishing](https://compose.ai/Multimedia Publishing.png)
Autocomplete Everywhere
Use autocomplete across all of your tools & accelerate your writing.
![creativity](https://compose.ai/Creativity.png)
Personalization Of Your Writing Style
Our platform learns your "voice" & suggests personalized phrases.
![connect](https://compose.ai/Connect.png)
Unobtrusive Universal Integration
Our system seamlessly integrates with your existing platforms & tools.
## Loved by Everybody
A recent study found that $100k+ earners spend 87% of their workweek typing. Our platform is changing that: consider Compose AI as your personal writing assistant.
## Frequently Asked Questions
### What is Compose AI?
Compose AI is a free Chrome plugin that accelerates your writing, lets you use auto complete anywhere, and will decrease your time spent typing.
### What is the cost?
The plugin is free to use forever, and there is a premium version with some advanced features including use of some of our personalization features.
### How do I contact support?
We can be contacted with any questions at support (at) Compose AI, and we'd love to help you in any way that we can.
### What about my privacy?
We take your privacy extremely seriously. Your text is only used to provide you with the best autocompletions possible. We will never sell your data. View our privacy policy for more details.
![Compose AI Logo](https://compose.ai/compose_ai_dark.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Compose.ai**

**Mission:**  
Compose.ai aims to cut your writing time by 40% through its AI-powered autocomplete technology.

**Foundation and Team:**  
Founded in 2020 and based in San Francisco, Compose.ai emerged from Y Combinator's W21 batch. The company operates with a lean team of 7 dedicated employees and is under the guidance of its group partner, Nan.

**Product Offering:**  
Originally launched as a free Chrome extension, Compose.ai functions as an AI writing assistant designed to seamlessly integrate with various online platforms—much like how Gmail autocompletes your emails, but expanded to any text input. Whether you want to write emails, create documents, or simply chat faster, Compose.ai’s goal is to help you write more efficiently across your favorite tools.

**Key Features:**  
1. **AI-Powered Autocomplete:** The extension enhances your writing by suggesting completions and phrases.
2. **Personalization:** As you use it, Compose.ai learns your unique writing style and offers tailored suggestions.
3. **Universal Integration:** It works with multiple platforms without disrupting your workflow, making it a versatile tool for professionals.

**User Base:**  
The tool is trusted by over 400,000 users and 10,000 teams, highlighting its widespread adoption in improving writing efficiency.

**Pricing Model:**  
Compose.ai is free to use with an option for a premium version, which offers additional features. This accessibility encourages a broad range of users—from casual writers to business professionals—to take advantage of its capabilities.

**Privacy Commitment:**  
Compose.ai respects user privacy, ensuring that the text you generate is used only to improve your writing experience and will never be sold.

**In Summary:**  
Compose.ai is more than just a writing assistant; it's a productivity tool designed to help you articulate your thoughts faster and more clearly. As the world increasingly demands quick communication, Compose.ai positions itself as an essential ally in the quest for efficiency. Whether you're drafting an important email or creating content, this tool is worth a look if you want to reclaim precious time from your writing tasks.

**Explore More:** To learn about the product, sign up for a free trial, or install the extension, visit [Compose.ai](https://compose.ai).
